refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets a cursor name for a given link resource

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns an string containing the active cursor name. If no cursor is active then NULL is returned.
If a link resource is passed to ingres_cursor it returns the cursor name recorded for the link. If no link is passed then ingres_cursor returns the cursor name asssociated with the default link.

example.title: ingres_cursor example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = ingres_connect($database, $user, $password);

ingres_prepare("select * from table", $link);

$cursor_name = ingres_cursor($link);

echo $cursor_name;

?>
